title: How to Remove Mold From Books (and Prevent It From Coming Back)
description: Given the health risks associated with mold, it’s not something you want in or near your home. Unfortunately, flooding, humidity, and/or improper storage can result in mold growing on basically anything we own—including our books.

title: Stop Storing Clothes in Plastic Dry Cleaning Bags (and Use This Alternative Instead)
description: When you pick up items of clothing from the dry cleaner, they typically come in thin, clear, plastic garment bags. Once you get them home, it would make sense to simply pop them in your closet, in the bag. After all, these are pieces of clothing that you’re paying someone else to clean, so they must be worth the…

title: How to Open Windows That Were Painted Shut
description: When a window has been closed for years—or even over a long winter—it’s normal for it to stick a bit when you try to open it again. But sometimes it takes more than some extra muscle to let the fresh air in—especially in situations where a window has been painted shut.
